title: The Annunciation of the Angel to Mary
textHTML:
1. The Annunciation

The Angel Gabriel appears to Mary, announcing she is to be the Mother of God.

,

title: The visitation of Mary to Saint Elizabeth
textHTML:
2. The visitation.

Elizabeth greets Mary: “Blessed art Thou amoung women and blessed is the fruit of thy womb”

,

title: The nativity of Jesus in Bethlehem
textHTML:
3. The nativity.

The Virgin Mary gives birth to the Redeemer of the World. “And this will be a sign for you: you will find an infant wrapped in swaddling clothes and lying in a manger.”

,

title: The presentation of Jesus to the Temple
textHTML:
4. The presentation

The Blessed Mother presents the Child Jesus in the Temple.

,

title: The finding of Jesus in the Temple
textHTML:
5. The finding

The Blessed Mother finds Jesus in the Temple.

title: The Agony of Jesus in the garden
textHTML:
1. The Agony of Jesus in the Garden.

At Gethsemane, Jesus prays as He contemplates the sins of the world.

,

title: The scourging of Jesus at the pillar
textHTML:
2. The scourging of Jesus at the Pillar.

Jesus is lashed with whips.

,

title: The crowning with thorns
textHTML:
3. The crowning with Thorns.

Jesus is mocked and crowned with thorns.

,

title: The Carrying of the Cross
textHTML:
4. The Carrying of the Cross.

Jesus carries the heavy cross upon His shoulders to Calvary.

,

title: The crucifixion and death of Jesus
textHTML:
5. The crucifixion and death of Jesus.

Jesus is nailed to the cross and dies after hours of agony.

title: The Resurrection of Jesus Christ
textHTML:
1. The Resurrection.

Jesus rises glorious and immortal, three days after His death.

,

title: The Ascension of Jesus to Heaven
textHTML:
2. The Ascension.

Jesus ascends into Heaven forty days after His Resurrection.

,

title: The descent of Holy Spirit
textHTML:
3. The descent of Holy Spirit.

The Holy Spirit descends upon Mary and the Apostles.

,

title: The Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary into Heaven
textHTML:
4. The Assumption of Mary.

Mary is united with her Divine Son in Heaven.

,

title: The Coronation of the Blessed Virgin Mary, Queen of Heaven and Earth
textHTML:
The Coronation of Mary.

Mary is gloriously crowned as Queen of Heaven and earth.

title: The Baptism of Jesus
textHTML:
1. The Baptism of Jesus.

The heavens open wide and the voice of the Father declares Jesus the beloved Son.

,

title: The Wedding Feast at Cana
textHTML:
2. The wedding Feast at Cana.

The first of the miracles, Christ changes water into wine thanks to the intervention of Mary.

,

title: The proclamation of the Kingdom of God
textHTML:
3. The proclamation of the Kingdom of God.

Jesus proclaims the coming of the Kingdom of God.

,

title: The Transfiguration
textHTML:
4. The Transfiguration of Jesus.

Jesus is revealed in glory to Peter, James and John.

,

title: The Institution of the Eucharist
textHTML:
5. The institution of the Eucharist.

Christ offers his body and blood as food under the signs of bread and wine.
